price: None se duterere iyo, tureke guhishura urwibutso (Qur’an), kubera ko muri abantu barengera (b’inkozi z’ibibi banze kurwemera)?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
